questions.question: What is Shakespeare's most famous play?

questions.answer: Packed all the things and ready to go.

What is personification?
questions.answer: To give human characteristics to something that isn't human
questions.filler1: To give human characteristics to humans
questions.filler2: To give an inanimate object's characteristics to a human
